alert.note: Alert for Lincoln (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 09 at 3:13PM PDT until August 09 at 6:15PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM PDT THIS EVENING FOR NORTHEASTERN LINCOLN COUNTY... At 313 PM PDT, Emergency management reported thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Flash flooding is already occurring. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Emergency management reported flash flooding at Dry Valley and Echo Canyon State Park. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Pioche, Ursine, Horsethief Gulch Campground, Meadow Valley Campground, Ranch Campground, Eagle Valley, Echo Canyon State Park, Cathedral Gorge State Park and Panaca. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
